title: Public Holidays - Institute of Pharmacy
content:
Title: Public Holidays - Institute of Pharmacy

The following days will be observed as Public Holidays for Nirma University and its constituent Institutes for the year 2025.
| Occasion | Date | Day |
|---|---|---|
| Makar Sankranti/Magha Bihu/Hazarat Ali’s Birthday | 14-Jan-25 | Tuesday |
| Maha Shivratri | 26-Feb-25 | Wednesday |
| Holi 2nd Day – Dhuleti | 14-Mar-25 | Friday |
| Eid-Ul-Fitra(Ramzan Eid) | 31-Mar-25 | Monday |
| Mahavir Janma Kalyanak (Mahavir Jayanti) | 10-Apr-25 | Thursday |
| Dr. Babasaheb Ambedkar Birthday | 14-Apr-25 | Monday |
| Bakri-Eid (Eid-Ul-Adha) | 07-Jun-25 | Saturday |
| Independence Day/Parsi New Year Day (Pateti) | 15-Aug-25 | Friday |
| Janmashtami (Shravan Vad-8) | 16-Aug-25 | Saturday |
| Ganesh Chaturthi/Samvatsari (Chaturthi Paksha) | 27-Aug-25 | Wednesday |
| Mahatma Gandhi’s Birthday | 02-Oct-25 | Thursday |
| Diwali | 20-Oct-25 | Monday |
| Vikram Samvat New Year Day/Govardhan Pooja | 22-Oct-25 | Wednesday |
| Bhai Bij | 23-Oct-25 | Thursday |
| Guru Nanak’s Birthday/ Dev Diwali (Kartak Sud-15) | 05-Nov-25 | Wednesday |
| Christmas Day | 25-Dec-25 | Thursday |
Note: University and its constituent Institutes are closed on 2nd and 4th Saturday of every month.
